price: Those who disbelieve and prevent others from Allah’s way, He will render their deeds void.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: He will cause to be lost
